0 create host pc1
0 create host pc2
0 create host pc3
0 create router r1 2
0 create router r2 2
0 create switch s1 3
0 mac pc1:1 AAA1
0 mac pc2:1 AAA2
0 mac pc3:1 AAA3
0 mac r1:1 AAB1
0 mac r1:2 AAB2
0 mac r2:1 AAC1
0 mac r2:2 AAC2
0 ip pc1 222.222.222.222 255.255.255.0
0 ip pc2 111.111.111.111 255.255.255.0
0 ip pc3 111.111.111.113 255.255.255.0
0 ip r1:1 222.222.111.111 255.255.255.0
0 ip r1:2 111.111.111.112 255.255.255.0
0 ip r2:1 222.222.222.221 255.255.255.0
0 ip r2:2 222.222.111.112 255.255.255.0
0 route add pc1 222.222.222.0 255.255.255.0 0.0.0.0 1
0 route add pc1 111.111.111.0 255.255.255.0 222.222.222.221 1
0 route add pc2 111.111.111.0 255.255.255.0 0.0.0.0 1
0 route add pc2 222.222.222.0 255.255.255.0 111.111.111.112 1
0 route add pc3 111.111.111.0 255.255.255.0 0.0.0.0 1
0 route add pc3 222.222.222.0 255.255.255.0 111.111.111.112 1
0 route add r1 111.111.111.0 255.255.255.0 0.0.0.0 2
0 route add r1 222.222.111.0 255.255.255.0 0.0.0.0 1
0 route add r1 222.222.222.0 255.255.255.0 222.222.111.112 1
0 route add r2 111.111.111.0 255.255.255.0 222.222.111.111 2
0 route add r2 222.222.111.0 255.255.255.0 0.0.0.0 2
0 route add r2 222.222.222.0 255.255.255.0 0.0.0.0 1
0 connect pc1_1 r2_1
0 connect pc2_1 s1_1
0 connect pc3_1 s1_2
0 connect r1_2 s1_3
0 connect r1_1 r2_2
0 ping pc2 222.222.222.222
